text.tspan: Contains low level functions for graphics, input and anything that cannot be done in a HLE;
provides interfaces for system tools and libraries and a low-level, C-like language for LC/PC.
As minimal and fast a layer as possible.
Anything that does linear processing well
Anything that does parallel processing well
Main code for the game engine
This is one possible architecture for the testle engine.
THIS IS NOT THE ARCHITECTURE THAT WILL BE USED FOR TRESTLE ATM!!!
scripts may also handle the main loop and therefore graphics
